content: But now, building the new Astralink together with everyone... seems pretty nice too!

Phew, that was way too close!
Mors almost swept us away.
Lucky my car got to everyone in time.

As I watch the tiny world bubble slowly float up,
I find myself... feeling a bit moved.
Every day brings something to look forward to, new goals to achieve, and friends to meet!

Who puts that kind of stuff in tea?!
<size=30>Though... it's actually pretty good...</size>

Me? I'm not sleepy at all! I'm gonna stay here and have a staring contest with the little world!
Let's see who blinks first!

<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>,
if you're tired,
why don't you rest in the RV?

Back in the day, nothing made me happier
than packing my bags, knowing that tomorrow
Master and I would set off for places unknown!
Didn't Mors just say something about building a colle-\ncollection... anyway,\nsome kind of place to gather lots of things!

So, do we need to go to a lot of places to collect them?
Well then, when do we set off?

Alright! Next time we set out,
our goal is to reach the heavens,
and find some tiny worlds to explore!

But come to think of it, if we really flew up into the sky...
Wouldn't that be...
Even more wild!
